A: 1. What is any substance apart from food and water, that when taken can change the normal physical and mental functions of the body? (a) Food (b) Water (c) Drugs
2. Drugs are normally used to cure _ (a) hunger (b) illness (c) thirst
3. Which drug is used to treat headache, pain? (a) Nivaquine (b) Aspirin (c) Daga
4. Daga is used to treat headache, body pains, and _ (a) malaria (b) toothache (c) stomach ache
5. Nivaquine is used to treat _ (a) headache (b) pain (c) malaria
6. Which of these drugs is NOT listed as treating headache? (a) Aspirin (b) Panadol (c) Nivaquine
7. Traditional herbal drugs are also called _ occurring drugs (a) artificially (b) chemically (c) naturally
8. Traditional herbal drugs are derived from natural substances such as plants, animals, chalk and _ (a) plastic (b) charcoal (c) metal
9. Which of the following is a classification/form of drug? (a) Syrup (b) Food (c) Water
10. Which of these is a form of drug? (a) Ointment (b) Powder (c) Liquid
11. Modern drugs are also known as _ drugs (a) herbal (b) orthodox (c) traditional
12. Traditional drugs are usually served in their _ form (a) processed (b) natural (c) refined
13. Most traditional drugs come in herbal forms such as leaves, roots and _ of trees (a) fruits (b) flowers (c) barks
14. Modern drugs are artificially _ (a) grown (b) processed (c) harvested
15. Traditional drugs usually occur _ (a) artificially (b) naturally (c) synthetically
16. Modern drugs normally come in _ (a) large quantities (b) doses (c) natural forms
17. The entire plant is used for medicinal purposes in _ drugs (a) modern (b) synthetic (c) traditional
18. Which type of drug contains synthetic substances like chemicals and preservatives? (a) Herbal (b) Traditional (c) Modern
19. Most herbal drugs do not have specific _ date (a) manufacturing (b) expiry (c) production
20. Paracetamol is used to treat headache and _ pain (a) muscle (b) body (c) joint
